After the devastating mass shooting in El Paso, a young boy named Ruben began the #ElPasoChallenge to honor those killed. Inspired, Jayvaun and Mason started the #DaytonChallenge. 

In the face of tragedy, our children are leading the way. 
https://www.journal-news.com/news/national/dayton-ohio-shooting-boys-create-kindness-challenge-honor-victims/HWTXQkwWoz0qsx6OQ9DKjL/

RT @ilyseh Thanks so much to @BernieSanders for meeting with @NARALIowa members to discuss the critical importance of reproductive freedom! https://twitter.com/naral/status/1160363765839400966 QT @NARAL We imagine a world where people have the freedom to make our own decisions about our own bodies without government interference. Those are Iowa’s values too. Thanks so much for being here to chat with our members about reproductive freedom, @BernieSanders! #2020Election http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EBpwrH9XYAA-ZDD.jpg

Iowa has made me a better candidate from my very first visit. Listening to teachers, immigrants, farmers, and families across the state has helped shape our campaign policies to ensure they make an impact on peoples' lives.

That Jeffrey Epstein was allowed to take the coward’s way out & deny justice to his victims is a DISGRACE. Pedophiles deserve the Ninth Circle of Hell, but not before a full accounting. Everyone complicit should be held responsible. How the hell did fed prison let this happen?

Tens of thousands of Americans die each year because they lack health insurance.

Meanwhile the private health care industry made $100 billion in profits last year.

Greed is the business model of our health care system today and it is killing Americans.

A slight correction. Although some cities (eg, NYC) see over 50% abortion rates (in 2012-16 black mothers terminated 136,426 pregnancies & gave birth to 118,127 babies), nationally the total is just over 40%—still tragically high.
https://www.wsj.com/articles/lets-talk-about-the-black-abortion-rate-1531263697
https://www.urbancure.org/blog/post/abortion-is-the-biggest-single-negative-force-on-black-american-growth https://twitter.com/tedcruz/status/1160685658924560384 QT @tedcruz 1/2 My old con law prof, sadly, being deeply deceptive. Abortion targets in particular minority women. More than 1/2 of African-American babies, tragically, are aborted. Yes, PLEASE read full context. In 1926, Sanger spoke at a KKK rally in NJ. When I’m president, I will send Congress comprehensive gun violence prevention legislation and sign it into law within my first 100 days. That is why we need a 21st Century Economic Bill of Rights.

I met Matt yesterday who learned in March his rent would increase by ~70%, meaning less money for groceries & medical expenses. My Rent Relief Act would help ease the anxiety of a rent increase & guarantee people like Matt more money in their pockets.
https://www.adelnews.com/news/20190810/kamala-harris-meets-waukee-residents-amid-neighborhood-price-hike

How we #EndGunViolence:
✅ federal gun licensing program
✅ universal background checks
✅ ban assault weapons, high-capacity magazines, bump stocks
✅ close loopholes that allow domestic abusers & people on terrorist watchlists to buy guns

My full plan: https://corybooker.com/issues/gun-violence

It’s sad (and frightening) to see so many Americans on both sides of partisan unwittingly helping them. 

Putin has weaponized our polarization.

Over fifty years, comprehensive safety measures reduced per-mile driving deaths by almost 80% and prevented 3.5 million automobile deaths. We have to do the same for gun deaths—and I have a plan for that.

Yesterday, our delegation had a series of productive meetings, including with NGOs, civil society and justice sector leaders. It was a particular honor to meet with the family of Berta Caceres as we continue the fight for justice and human rights in her memory. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EBsHAssWwAIb41F.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EBsHAstW4AA9GoF.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EBsHAstXsAESQi1.jpg

Every American, regardless of income, is entitled to:

The right to a decent job that pays a living wage.
The right to quality health care.
The right to a complete education.
The right to affordable housing.
The right to a clean environment.
The right to a secure retirement.

It's time for a 21st Century Economic Bill of Rights. We are going to finish the work that FDR started and create an economy that works for ALL of our people. Join our town hall live now: https://www.pscp.tv/w/cCBFxDMyNzU3OTl8MUx5R0JBZ1pxWHBLTnwKgb-6cnYr9hx_4tSMnV-X6EtyIQLKSNo9ht1ORwCN
